New Records: Nikola Jokic and Russell Westbrook became the first pair of teammates to record triple-doubles in the same game multiple times in a single season
Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 35 points, 15 assists, and 12 rebounds; Russell Westbrook recorded a triple-double with 25 points, 10 assists, and 11 rebounds
Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Gordon's injury led to Russell Westbrook being moved into the starting lineup; Westbrook has performed well in the starting lineup, contributing to the Nuggets' 7-2 record in their last nine games
Post-Match Reflections: The Nuggets are fourth in the Western Conference standings with a 22-15 record; they are within three games of the Houston Rockets for the No. 2 seed
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets have a 74% chance of winning against the Dallas Mavericks; the game features a moneyline, spread, and total points bets
